alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS COUNTY THROUGH 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pike Lake Near Duluth, or 9 miles northeast of Cloquet, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hermantown, Duluth and Proctor around 440 PM CDT. City of Rice Lake around 455 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Cody, Grand Lake, Kenwood, Piedmont Heights, Duluth Heights, Munger, Adolph, Denfeld, Spirit Valley and Central Hillside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
